column4: can someone help me with getting Breezy Badger to configure sound?
it wont recognize it at all
i have been slaving away at the compaq for hours
so... the installer CD wouldn't run? once you installed it wouldnt boot? what?
so the install cd? or after you installed everything and tried to boot? or what? be more specific,    so... was this with the livecd or after install?
ok yes, but when did it freeze?
but was it an install CD or actually booting AFTER you installed?
wow, that's unheard of... lol... i'm willing to bet money if you re-torrent the iso and burned it again it would work, happened to me with a debian install cd
well i already spent 3 hours installing Ubuntu Breezy Badger
do you know how to force the system to probe for ISA devices?
